title: J.VER Men's Dress Shirts Stretch Long Sleeve Formal Shirt Solid Business Casual Button Down Shirts for Wedding Prom
description: Stretch Fabric: This mens long sleeve dress shirt is made of 4-way stretch fabric that is soft and comfortable, allowing your body to move more flexibly

Design: 1. Adjustable button cuff design allows you to choose different button positions according to different needs. 2. A back waist design that subtly enhances the silhouette. 3. Black buttons allow the shirt to be used as a tuxedo

Occasion: Men's long sleeve shirts are suitable for business, wedding, party, dating, prom, dinner, school celebration and other occasions, whether it is a formal or casual occasions this shirt is a good choice; it is also an ideal gift for your family
Size Color: Our formal shirts offer you a variety of sizes and colors to meet your different needs. Shirt sizes are standard US sizes. Please refer to the size chart to choose the right size for you
Washing Method: It is recommended to hand wash or machine wash in cold water to protect the fabric's texture and color. This shirt can be ironed at low temperatures
